QuestData.Title: Leader of the Bloodscale
QuestData.Description: A bounty is hereby declared by the Cenarion Expedition on Rajis Fyashe, leader of the Bloodscale naga. The naga sorceress was last sighted at Serpent Lake, in the northern region of Zangarmarsh.$B$BThe Bloodscale are to be considered extremely dangerous and their leader is to be approached with extreme caution.$B$BThose seeking to claim the bounty are advised to report to Warden Hamoot at Cenarion Refuge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Rajis Fyashe at Serpent Lake and return to Warden Hamoot at the Cenarion Refuge in Zangarmarsh for a reward.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're here to claim the bounty for Fyashe? That's the best news I've heard all day.
QuestData.RewardText: I'll bet the Bloodscale will think twice about attacking expedition scouts again. Take this as a reward, $n. You've earned it.
